name: Sornvis
body:
### Welcome to Sornvis
Here we visualize a simplified model of Renato Duarte's [Self-organizing reservoir neural network](https://mindmodeling.org/cogsci2014/papers/083/paper083.pdf) which is in turn inspired by the original model published by (insert author name).

### Authors and Contributors
Iris Proff and I implemented and visualized the model. It is currently under development.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
